trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around December 10th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI simply looked at a hellicopter flying by with a bright reddish light some distance in front of the chopper, maybe 200 feet, and as the chopper flew by the light maintained the same distance from the front of the chopper untill I lost site of them as they went behind trees and houses.All I remember about the time is that it was dark outside and it was before 9pm. There is a large amount of hellicopter traffic in this area, From, basicly, Boulder Co. to Buckly Air force Base. I dont know why I waited so long to report this. I guess I just needed to think about what I saw.
